entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 8:10 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:10 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023
